title: Graveyard Rush
author: Aristeidis Pirros
excerpt: Greetings, I would like to introduce you to "Graveyard Rush", a Halloween themed mobile game! [IMG] The game follows the adventures of "Skully", a...
siteName: TouchArcade - iPhone, iPad, Android Games Forum
text: Greetings, I would like to introduce you to "Graveyard Rush", a Halloween themed mobile game! The game follows the adventures of "Skully", a skeleton warrior that comes to life in a halloween themed world with all kinds of quirky and spooky creatures. As skully wanders the game world, he encounters and recruits other characters, like "Mortimer the Timid", a necromancer who is afraid of the dead. The game's mechanics combine different genres, like endless runner mechanics, RPG style fast-paced combat. Here is some gameplay! Interested? I am looking for people to playtest the game while building a community to help develop and enjoy it! If this sound cool download the Demo on Itch https://aristeidis.itch.io/graveyard-rush-demo Wanna follow the game's progress ? Have any feedback? Let us know in our Discord Server https://discord.gg/TKVKpD76FQ Share This Page
html:
1. Greetings,
    I would like to introduce you to "Graveyard Rush", a Halloween themed mobile game!

    The game follows the adventures of "Skully", a skeleton warrior that comes to life in a halloween themed world with all kinds of quirky and spooky creatures.

    As skully wanders the game world, he encounters and recruits other characters, like "Mortimer the Timid", a necromancer who is afraid of the dead.

    The game's mechanics combine different genres, like endless runner mechanics, RPG style fast-paced combat.

    Here is some gameplay!

    Interested?
    I am looking for people to playtest the game while building a community to help develop and enjoy it!
    If this sound cool download the Demo on Itch
    https://aristeidis.itch.io/graveyard-rush-demo

    Wanna follow the game's progress ? Have any feedback?
    Let us know in our Discord Server
    https://discord.gg/TKVKpD76FQ

Share This Page
